name: Bibi's Heebie-Jeebies (GDL33 Submission)
description:
Bibi got stuck in a scary crypt, and he needs your help to get out before he gets the heebie-jeebies!

Use his unique ability to temporarily turn into a ghost to solve some puzzles and lead him to safety!

This game is a submission to the 72-hour GDL33 Game Jam. THEME : "Death is not the end... Death is progress."

Our last scene didn't build correctly, so here's a gif of the end screen you SHOULD have seen if you make it all the way through! ♥ Imgur link of the gif!

This game was made for use with either controller and keyboard.

Controls
Controller
movement - left stick
jump - X
dash - ▢
interact - ◯
ghost - △

Keyboard
movement - wasd/arrows
jump - space
dash - shift
interact - e
ghost - q

Assets Used:

Player Character: https://einav23.itch.io/platform-adventurer-character

Tileset: https://incolgames.itch.io/dungeon-platformer-tile-set-pixel-art

Skeleton: https://grafxkid.itch.io/sprite-pack-6

Torches etc: https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck

All sound effects sourced from Freesound.org.
